item.immersive_aircraft.bomb_bay.descrip: Thèid TNT, chan eil e a’ briseadh bùthan ach bidh e a’ dèanamh milleadh mòr.
item.immersive_aircraft.heavy_crossbow.d: Crosbò trom le punch làidir, feumaidh e freagairtean.
item.immersive_aircraft.airship.descript: Airships may not be the fastest vehicle, but they sure are easy to maneuver.
item.immersive_aircraft.cargo_airship.de: Slow agus ag ithe fuel ach a’ tairgse stòradh iomlan.
item.immersive_aircraft.biplane.descript: Luath agus gu math earbsach. Dèan cinnteach gu bheil do rìoghachd fada gu leòr.
item.immersive_aircraft.gyrodyne.descrip: Who needs an engine if one could power the aircraft with pure brawn? Give it a good push and off it flies!
item.immersive_aircraft.quadrocopter.des: A masterwork of engineering! 4 rotors strapped to some bamboo. Perfect for building, and that's about it.
item.immersive_aircraft.bamboo_hopper.de: Aircraft chonky le tri suidheachan agus pontoons airson tilleadh gu sàbhailte air uisge.
immersive_aircraft.gyrodyne_target_reach: Toraidhean iarann air rotair as ìsle, deiseil airson tocail!
immersive_aircraft.invalid_dimension: Chan eil an aircraft seo ag obair anns an raon seo.
immersive_aircraft.fat.out: Tha thu ro ghrànda airson a bhith a’ tighinn!
option.immersive_aircraft.separateCamera: Usaibh camara air leth ann an aer-líon.
option.immersive_aircraft.useThirdPerson: Default gu camara ann an treas duine ann an aer-líon.
option.immersive_aircraft.burnFuelInCrea: Losgadh gas ann an mod cruthachail.
option.immersive_aircraft.useCustomKeybi: Usaibh iuchra-làimhe ioma, dh’fhaodadh e ceartachadh modan sònraichte.
option.immersive_aircraft.showHotbarEngi: Freagair an gheòidh inneal thairis air a’ hotbar.
option.immersive_aircraft.crashDamage: Dàmhnaich an saoghal nuair a thuiteas.
option.immersive_aircraft.preventKillThr: Cha phlabhairt e an saoghal nuair a thuiteas.
option.immersive_aircraft.healthBarRow: Cuir air falbh an slighe slàinte de chàraichean.
option.immersive_aircraft.damagePerHealt: Lorg a bharrachd freagairtean a’ dèanamh na h- aircraft nas seasmhachd.
option.immersive_aircraft.weaponsAreDest: Goirid cuid armachd a thoirt air a’ bhloigh.
option.immersive_aircraft.dropInventory: Thoir às an innleachd, na shàbhail e taobh a-staigh an t-adhair.
option.immersive_aircraft.dropUpgrades: Thoir às na leasachadh agus freagairtean, na shàbhail e taobh a-staigh an t-adhair.
option.immersive_aircraft.regenerateHeal: Ath-nuair a’ cur slàinte gach tick a thèid seachad, a’ simileadh giùlan vanilla.
option.immersive_aircraft.requireShiftFo: Fulang ri gèir fhad ’s a tha thu a’ cumail shift, mura h-eil, faodaidh tu dìreach a dhol a-steach don chàraichean.
immersive_aircraft.tooltip.no_target: Feumaidh e a bhith air a chuir seachad air an làr!
